title: Link Power BI to an Excel file in SharePoint Online
excerpt: In this vlog, we will learn how we can consume data from the Excel Online to Power BI. Our Excel file has been stored in the SharePoint Document Library.   We need to fetch the data from SharePoint Document Libraryâ€™s Excel file to Power BI Desktop. In this video, we will learn step by step procedure
